attributes.action: Calling on the home secretary to review UKBA decision to remove Scotland's College highly trust status
attributes.additional_details:
Calling on the Home Secretary to review UKBA's decision remove the HTS of some of Scotland's colleges.

No student should ever be unjustly removed from their course, never mind their country.  These students are currently sitting their end of year exams we are calling on the home secretary to review this decision to allow these students to sit their exams in good knowledge they will not be removed from the course and country they paid to come to.
